Turkey and Armenia never established official diplomatic relations when Armenia emerged as an independent nation after the breakup of the Soviet Union. grammar.item: What type of pizza do you have?

prompt.item:
We have four types of pizza:
  • [Meat_Pizza]
  • veggie
  • plain cheese
  • everything on top

Great, we deliver to your area!
Okay, we can deliver right to you!
